interest.title: Interest & Passion
items: I learn new things outside class
I enjoy deep work on topics I like
I follow trends in my industry
I love problem-solving or creative tasks
I am curious and ask questions

questions.scenario: It is 11 PM. You discover a major error in your group's final presentation due at 8 AM tomorrow.

options.text: Panic and email the professor asking for an extension.
Focus on fixing the critical error first to ensure the presentation is functional.
Stay up all night trying to rewrite the entire presentation perfectly.

questions.scenario: You are struggling with a difficult assignment. You find a document online that solves the exact problem.

options.text: Copy and paste it. Everyone does it.
Read it to understand the logic, then close it and write your own unique work.
Change the words and synonyms so the plagiarism checker doesn't catch me.

questions.scenario: You deliver a presentation and a senior gives you harsh, public feedback about your mistakes.

options.text: Feel insulted and avoid presenting in front of them again.
Ignore the harsh tone, write down the valid points, and improve for next time.
Argue back immediately to prove why you were right.

questions.scenario: A team member is slacking off and hasn't replied to messages for 2 days before the deadline.

options.text: Do their part yourself and complain to the teacher later.
Call them directly to check if they are facing a personal emergency or need help.
Remove their name from the final submission without telling them.
